Header.title: Welcome to milaan matka 777
Header.paragraph: Welcome to our platform! Experience the best gaming experience with us.

About.paragraph: Milaan Matka 777 is your ultimate destination for thrilling and fast-paced Matka gaming. Inspired by the classic Satta Matka tradition, our app brings a modern twist to an age-old game of luck and numbers. Whether you're a seasoned player or a curious beginner, Milaan Matka 777 offers a smooth, secure, and exciting gaming experience right at your fingertips.

GameInstructions.title: Register Account
GameInstructions.description: Create your account by providing basic details and verify your mobile number.

GameInstructions.title: Add Funds
GameInstructions.description: Deposit money using various payment methods .

GameInstructions.title: Choose Market
GameInstructions.description: Select from different markets like Satta King, Kalyan, or Main Mumbai.

GameInstructions.title: Place Bet
GameInstructions.description: Choose your numbers and place your bet before the closing time.

GameInstructions.title: Wait for Results
GameInstructions.description: Results are announced at fixed times. Check your winning status.

GameInstructions.title: Withdraw Winnings
GameInstructions.description: Withdraw your winnings anytime using the same payment methods.

HowToPlayImage.title: How to Play Matka
HowToPlayImage.description: Follow these simple steps to start playing Matka game

Features.title: 24x7 Support
Features.text: Round the clock customer support for all your gaming needs

Features.title: Mobile Friendly
Features.text: Play anytime, anywhere on your mobile
